mng: to carry, to convey, to load, to hold, to fill up, and, also, as well as, simultaneously
to record in writing, to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc), Taiwan pr. [zai4], year

exm.mng: to forward (a shipment), to reproduce (e.g. a printed work)
to load into, to record, to write into, to enter (data), to go into (the records), to go down (in history)
to carry, to convey, delivery, supply
to bear the weight, to sustain
